notes: Bootcamp level 5: c-shape scale, focusing on numbers. Alternating thirds.
G shape, not great on by 3rds. Stopped before jam. Noodled with The Kids Are Alright
Worked on G shape. Did jams. Played with thirds & sorta did 'The Man With the Bag'
Connecting CAG. Review numbers. Single strings in key with numbers.
Review CAG. Work on connecting. All jams and exercises for connecting. Ready for E.
Work on E. Did a bunch of drilling. Still have exercises to finish.
Finish E, including jam. Start D.
Jesus Wants Me for a Sunbeam
Connecting caged. Up to the first jam. Was sucky at jam.
F in all positions over and over.
F stuff. Start Ab stuff. Some noodging around at the end.
Finish level 5. Not solid, though. Fiddle with funk chords.
Start level 6. Learn basic progression of Чудесная странна
D to F in position, including triplets
D jamming. F Jamming. Typical jamming.
Pentatonics in A and F. Jamming. Visualizing shapes.
Scales in C, F. Playing a bunch of stomock.
D to F in position, A/G/C forms. Little jam in G.
Breakthrough on chord shapes. Arpeggio'd. Did D to F exercises again.
Doc told me to stop for a week or two.
Caged to minor chords (a bit overwhelmed first day back). Noodled fingering Like A Virgin.
I, IV, V, Vm (did well on the jam!)
I, IV, V, Vm (sucked all around)
I, IV, V, Vm (finished). Fingering those tool-using mammals.
A bit of this a bit of that.
Scales around the right side of the circle, F-B
Started breaking out of the box. Mostly watching, a little playing.
Chevy Van. Roots, thirds, and fifths for all keys.
Roots, thirds and fifths. Figured out I was skipping G, duh.
Triads around the circle, slowly. Then started the walk-up.
Minor triads, first two examples. Review major triads.
Major triads again. Getting a little better.
Run through triads in three keys
Minor triads. Application of minor triads.
Hybrid picking. Figure out mid-fretboard starting points.
Triads across all four sets. Triad major chord progressions around 5th fret (CGDA +F) record A Woman's Place demo
Acoustic day. Почему падаеть небо. Record a new draft of Bluegrass Caliphate.
Acoustic at cabin. Danny songs. Can't remember the triads.
C scale straight and alternating 3rds. A bit of triad fun. Some playing.
New strings. A little funk rhythm (meh). C/G/F scales. Tool-using. Stuff I like.
Pentatonic F-E. So rusty. TUM. P&S SIL.
Record video of Stuff I Like
Start Justus West speed course. Up to 170bpm. Record worst Homeschool Mom track yet.
Record bad draft of Jesus Says
Record good draft of Jesus Says
Add more guitar to Jesus Says
Play Stuff I Like. MM Minor C shape.
Begin regular repertoire work. Minor chord shapes & arpeggios.
Review minor arpeggios. Noodle. Try to get it more ingrained.
What new routine? Try to just get back into it.
Fresh start. Doing minor section of caged path.
Continue minor section. Other scales. Как на войне
Full new routine in d (not sure what do with string sets)
New routine in D up to triplets but with rhythm track at speed.
Partially strung banjo with nylgut. Scales.
Finish G4D8. Lots of jamming. Broken thirds on string pairs.
Finish G4D7 & start D8 in lessons.
Finish G4 (very meh on it). Play a bit.
Start You've Got to Hide Your Love Away
Scales, Minor Arpeggios, Beatles, Cumbia Ab
